attributes.action: Stop further privatisation of the management of prisons but to use privatisation for the construction and maintenance of prisons only. Therebye providing suficient prison places, value for money to the taxpayer with decency.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The expertise and efficiency of the private sector should be used to build and maintain prisons by competitive tender. The management of prisons should remain in the public sector. It is immoral to profit from imprisonment.
